titles.title: Bonus Depreciation Extension to Create Jobs Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for one year the special depreciation allowances for certain property.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/21/2010--Introduced. Bonus Depreciation Extension to Create Jobs Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2011 the additional 50% depreciation allowance for investment property, including computer software, water utility property, and qualified leasehold improvement property, which has a recovery period of 20 years of less.
